summary: Defines a BaseIMU class that abstracts communication with an inertial measurement unit, handling process lifecycle, packet retrieval, timeout management, and queue monitoring to supply IMU data to the telemetry system, usable with real hardware or simulated sources.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, reusable component for acquiring and supervising IMU sensor data in rocket flight control and telemetry pipelines, supporting both live hardware integration and simulation environments.
